alert.note: Alert for Holmes (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 3:22PM EDT until June 13 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 222 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Bonifay, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bonifay, Esto, Noma, Miller Crossroads, Holmes County Airport, Bethlehem, Tendil Crossing, Gritney, Holland Crossroads, Ards Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads, Izagora and Noma Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
